news.title: Layoff announcements soar to the highest since 2020 as DOGE slashes federal staff
news.summary: U.S. employers announced 172,017 layoffs for the month, up 245% from January. It was the highest monthly count since July 2020.

news.title: Global bonds sell off as investors react to Trump's tariffs and a German 'paradigm shift'
news.summary: Government bonds were selling off all over the world on Thursday. German borrowing costs are hovering at multi-decade highs. German government bonds are selling off across the world. German yields are at their highest level in more than 20 years.

news.title: Macy's turnaround starts to take shape, but ailing stores weigh on quarterly results
news.summary: Macy's is in the midst of an aggressive strategy to close underperforming stores and invest in better performing locations as it looks to reverse sales slump.

news.title: European Central Bank cuts rates by another quarter point amid Trump tariff threats
news.summary: Markets had been widely pricing in a 25-basis-point interest rate reduction from the ECB. The ECB is expected to announce a reduction in its main interest rate on Thursday.

news.title: 'Obstacles' in Egypt's $53 billion plan to rebuild Gaza, install Palestinian Authority control
news.summary: The plan has come under fire for omitting key answers on issues like governance, the future of Hamas, and funding. The plan has been criticized for omits key answers.

news.title: ECB cuts rates. Lagarde in spotlight after German bonds tumble on spending plan.
news.summary: The European Central Bank on Thursday cut interest rates by a quarter-point. It was responding to signs of deteriorating activity and weakening inflation. The move came despite bond-market turmoil over plans for a splurge of spending.

news.title: You’re eligible for Medicare but work full-time. Here are 3 tips on how and when to enroll.
news.summary: Ditch your employer’s health coverage? That may be the best option — but there are trade-offs. Here are some of the best and worst options.

news.title: Macy’s stock falls as it cuts guidance in the face of ‘external uncertainties’
news.summary: The retailer said it’s taking a ‘prudent’ approach to its outlook as it warns of a profit shortfall.

news.title: BJ’s Wholesale bucks the trend by providing an in-line outlook. The stock is gaining.
news.summary: Membership-based discount retailer and Costco rival sees biggest growth for comparable-club sales in nearly 2 years. Membership-based. discount retailer, Costco rival see biggest growth in comparable- club sales in almost 2 years, according to new figures.

news.title: ‘Don’t get your operation on a Thursday,’ this hospital expert warned. Here’s his plan to save costs and lives.
news.summary: Eugene Litvak has a proven way to improve U.S. hospitals, he says. If only they’d let him.
